price: Sε (Amane-hunu gya) no hu wͻn wͻ akyirikyiri baabi a, wͻbεte sε εde abufu-hyeε rebobͻ mu na εrepͻ soͻ.
arabic: إِذَا رَأَتۡهُم مِّن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ سَمِعُواْ لَهَا تَغَيُّظٗا وَزَفِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: idhā ra-athum min makānin baʿīdin samiʿū lahā taghayyuẓan wazafīran
